traits.Camouflage: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.
traits.Water Breathing: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

actions.Tentacles: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16+1d4 + 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.
actions.Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Lo: A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.
